pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.6: Ime kho panāyasmanto sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.8: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.9: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā chabbaggiye bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.10: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.13: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.18: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
